txt.en: 'Hey, it looks like the guard's coming this way... wait, no he's walking on.'
'If you had some food, like say a fresh caught corbie, we could share.'
'We could share our food, then everyone in Ost Guruth could have some thin broth with a slice of carrot if they were lucky.'
'You need to look after yourself first. That's just the way things are.'
